Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)
Virtual Entity of Relevant Acronyms (Version 1.9, June 2002)

Definition.WordDefinition: PVC Permanent Virtual Circuit / Channel / Connection (ATM)

Dictionary.Name: Virtual Entity of Relevant Acronyms (Version 1.9, June 2002)

Definition.WordDefinition: PVC n 1: a polymer of vinyl chloride used instead of rubber in electric cables [syn: {polyvinyl chloride}] 2: irregularity of cardiac rhythm; recurrent occurrences can be a precursor of ventricular fibrillation [syn: {premature ventricular contraction}]
